title.rendered: Find Your Niche With Marketing Automation

content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”overflow”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1504895160519{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Strategies And Tactics to Own the Vertical

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1508916865524{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]There are some client types that are outside your scope and others that you know you can impact quickly. The latter can become a niche you can own.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”In this issue of Agency Perspectives, you’ll learn:” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1508916890225{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}” el_class=”sm-hide”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron sm-hide”]

  • How one agency used niche marketing to gain new business faster
  • The role of marketing automation in discovering potential niches
  • The keys to identifying the best niche(s) for your agency

[/vc_column_text]

Greg Budrow

Core Integrated Marketing

“Our client in this niche was able to convert leads at a 50% faster rate than with previous methods. For us, having a provable solution and success cases helped us gain new business at much faster rates.”

What is Agency Perspectives?
[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1516171371764{padding-right: 5em !important;}” el_class=”sm-hide”]Agency Perspectives lets you hear directly from other agencies about how they are using marketing automation to create higher value relationships, build monthly recurring revenue, and prove value to clients. It’s available exclusively from SharpSpring. Contact us if you’d like to share your expertise as an author.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_column_text]
